value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - ALM ToolKit with Christian Wade
value.excerpt: The ALM Toolkit is an excellent tool for aiding users with Tabular Model management. ALM Toolkit provides the following features: - Database Compare - Code Merging - Easy Deployments - Source-Control

value.excerpt: Customer retention is one of the most common scenarios of data analysis, which is very useful for business. value.excerpt: One of the interesting calculation challenges in BI systems is a segmentation or grouping on a numeric value, based on an occurrence of another value. value.title: Dynamic Banding or Grouping in Power BI   Using DAX Measures   Choose the Count of Bins
value.excerpt: Banding (or binning or grouping) is a scenario that can be implemented both statically and dynamically in Power BI. Dynamic banding means selecting the bin (or band) configuration, and the banding changes based on the user selection of the slicer. Imagine that we have a count of customers by their age
